title: Legend of the white snake = Bai she zhuan
creator_credit: Fu Chaowu and Shanghai Film Studio
brief_description: A love story about the tragic romance of an attractive lady, transformed from a thousand year old white snake, and a handsome young scholar. This legend takes place in the beautiful city of Hangzhou at West Lake. From a work by Tien Han and featuring Shanghai’s Second Peking Opera Troupe with the principal roles performed by Li Bingshu, Fang Xiaoya, Lu Boping, Su Shengyi, Chen Baiping. Chinese dialogue and subtitles.
